result.title: Report on the success of in-country workshop
result.description: Building on mutual agreement on which areas to be of focus through training needs assessments and the CS work produced by those who participate in the sixmonth UNUFTP training program in Iceland a workshop will be developed and held in a selected partner country The target audience and topics of this workshop will depend on the specific needs identified through preliminary work The workshop will be approximately 510 days and involve participants and contributions from local fisheries education and training institutions
